content: Today we are pleased to announce the fourth quarter revenues of $6.1 million and an operating profit of $309,000 for the quarter ending December 31, 2022. This compares with revenues of $6.2 million and an operating profit of $312,000 for the fourth quarter ended December 25, 2021. For the fiscal year, we are delighted to report revenues of $26.6 million as compared to revenues of $22.4 million in fiscal year '21. For the fiscal year, we are reporting $2.2 million in operating profit compared to 513,000 in fiscal year '21. Revenues totaled $6.1 million in Q4 2022, compared with $6.2 million generated in Q4 2021, a slight decrease. For 2022, gross margin totaled $7.3 million, compared with $4.8 million for 2021. Selling general and administrative expenses totaled $1.3 million in Q4, 2022, an increase of 30% when compared with SG&A expenses of 1.0 million in Q4, 2021. For fiscal '22, SG&A totaled $5.1 million compared to $4.3 million in 2021. The company generated operating income of $309,000 in Q4, 2022, compared with operating income of $312,000 in Q4 2021. For 2022, operating income totaled $2.2 million compared with $0.5 million in 2021. Accounts receivable at December 31, 2022 totaled $3.8 million, down from $4.9 million at December 25, 2021. Inventories totaled $4.9 million at the end of December 31, '22, compared to $3.9 million at December 25, '21. Payables and accruals totaled $2.7 million at December 31, '22, down from $3.2 million at December 25, 2021. Deferred revenue increased from $1.7 million at the end of 2021 to $2.5 million on December 31, 2022. I'm a long term shareholder, and my question is the record operating income in 2022 and cash balances of $8.3 million any plan to get that cash back to shareholders in a dividend or share buyback?
